name: Kori and The Forgotten Tower
description:
Inspired by numerous genres and fantastical games, you play as Kori as you attempt to uncover the mysteries in the forgotten tower.

It is recommended to play the game with a gamepad, and sound turned on. 

Studio Lunar Core Team:

Game Designer/Animator/Writer: Jonathan Umar-Khitab 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonathan-umar-khitab-9b770477/

https://www.artstation.com/sungho1114

https://www.linkedin.com/in/michael-wilson-54a22a175/

Music Composer: Calbert Warner: http://www.schematistmusic.com/

Systems, Tools, Character Programmer: William Christanto: https://ca.linkedin.com/pub/william-christanto/b2/80/643

Character Modeller and designer: Jenny Bilots:  https://www.linkedin.com/in/jennybilots/
